content.raw:
This pull request puts headers in:


```
#!c++

/usr/include/ignition/math@PROJECT_MAJOR_VERSION@/ignition/math/Quaternion.hh
/usr/include/ignition/math@PROJECT_MAJOR_VERSION@/ignition/math.hh
```

cmake (via `INCLUDE_DIRS`) includes `/usr/include/ignition/math@PROJECT_MAJOR_VERSION@`. Users of `ignition-math` won't have to change their includes, even between version updates.

I do need to fix pkgconfig to behave the same as cmake.

**Update:** pkgconfig looks correct already. Running `pkg-config --cflags --libs ignition-math2` produces `-std=c++11 -I/usr/include/ignition/math2  -lignition-math2`
